      • getMapPosition

        public java.awt.Point getMapPosition()
        The location on the map for this unit. Generally (-1, -1) if the unit is dead.
        Returns:
        The location on the map for this unit.

      • getDirection

        public MapSquare.DIRECTION getDirection()
        The direction this unit is facing. Ignored if the unit is dead.
        Returns:
        The direction this unit is facing.

      • move

        public BoardLocation move(int num)
        Return a new struct moved the requested number of squares in the location's direction. This can move off the board and is not blocked by units or walls.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of map squares to move.
        Returns:
        A new struct at the location moved to.

      • Rotate

        public BoardLocation Rotate(int num)
        Rotate the direction in a clockwise direction (NESW) the number of turns requested. A value of 4 results in a full circle.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of quarter turns to make. Can be negative or positive. Can be outside the range of -3 .. 3.
        Returns:
        A new struct at the location turned to.
